text:
ATM the Lucene block is not compiled into the Cocoon webapp with the
local.blocks.properties provided by Lenya.
creator: andreas@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text:
what is the purpose of

    <!-- patch lucene -->
    <echo message="INFO: Patch Lucene"/>
    <copy todir="${build.webapp}" filtering="off">
      <fileset dir="${src.webapp.dir}">
        <include name="WEB-INF/lib/lucene-1.3.jar"/>
      </fileset>
    </copy>

and why is the lucene lib in src/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/ and not in lib/
we now have 1.4rc2 in our cvs.
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
We currently have lucene 1.4.1 on SVN. Can someone else check if we can close
this bug?
